mainText:
Steve Jobs was and has always been a idol of mine. While some people look up
 to artists, actors, or musicians, I admire brains and brilliance. Steve Jobs was just that, a true visionary and genius. He revolutionized so much, and
 his presence will be missed. RIP Mr Jobs... Thanks for all you've done and the
 amazing products you have given me through the years. Apple will be my "go to" company for life.
author: Noel
